text: Caprice is a 1967 American comedy thriller movie. It was directed by Frank Tashlin. It stars Doris Day, Richard Harris, and Ray Walston. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. The movie did not make much money in ticket sales. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1967 comedy movies Category:1967 thriller movies Category:1960s spy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Frank Tashlin Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Paris Category:Movies set in Switzerland
title: Caprice (movie)
